headline: Schwab Trading Activity Index™: STAX Score Plunges Amid April Volatility
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, May 05, 2025--The Schwab Trading Activity Index™ (STAX) decreased to 41.18 in April, down from its score of 48.36 in March. The only index of its kind, the STAX is a proprietary, behavior-based index that analyzes retail investor stock positions and trading activity from Schwab’s millions of client accounts to illuminate what investors were actually doing and how they were positioned in the markets each month.
